mapper.sql: select disl.id, disl.batch_id, disl.object_api, disl.record_id, disl.operation_type, disl.operation_status, disl.error_message, disl.execution_time, disl.dept_id, disl.create_by, disl.create_time, disl.update_by, disl.update_time from datai_integration_sync_log disl
mapper.insert:
insert into datai_integration_sync_log
batch_id, object_api, record_id, operation_type, operation_status, error_message, execution_time, dept_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{batchId}, #{objectApi}, #{recordId}, #{operationType}, #{operationStatus}, #{errorMessage}, #{executionTime}, #{deptId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from datai_integration_sync_log where id in
#{id}
